video_description: http://drivencarreviews.com/ There's nothing else quite like the the 2012 Range Rover Evoque Coupe. It polarizes people. It makes a strong statement. Tom Voelk takes a look at this very unique vehicle that takes Land Rover into uncharted territory.
title: 2012 Range Rover Evoque Coupe HD Video Review
